capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's role as the gamekeeper and guardian of Hogwarts is really interesting. I mean, he's not just a teacher, but also responsible for taking care of the magical creatures in the Forbidden Forest. It's a tough job, but someone has to do it. And let's be honest, Hagrid is one of the most beloved characters in the series - his heart is always in the right place, even if he doesn't always show it.

I think Hagrid is a really important figure in the wizarding world, especially when it comes to the Hogwarts school. As the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher, he's always been there for us students, making sure we're safe and learning about the amazing creatures that live on the grounds. I mean, who else would be brave enough to deal with those Hippogriffs and Thestrals? He's like a guardian angel, watching over us all.
